name: owlwriter
description: Minimalist writing app with a fully customizable interface.

scripts.copy-assets: cpx "./*.{html,css,json,js}" dist && cpx "./fonts/**" dist/fonts && cpx "./images/**" dist/images && cpx "./libraries/**" dist/libraries && cpx "./scripts/**" dist/scripts
scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdir -p dist && npx tailwindcss --minify -o ./dist/output.css && npm run copy-assets
